what.title: What is GLM-Image?
what.desc: GLM-Image gives you instant access to powerful image generation capabilities. Whether you're a designer, marketers, or content creator, generate professional AI images in seconds without the queue.
what.feature_1_desc: Describe your vision in natural language. GLM-Image understands complex prompts and generates matching visuals.
what.feature_2_desc: Upload a reference image and create AI-powered variations with different styles and compositions.
what.feature_3_desc: Apply artistic styles to your photos. Transform ordinary images into stunning artwork.

how.title: How It Works
how.subtitle: Generate stunning AI images in 3 simple steps. No technical knowledge required.
how.step_1_desc: Describe the image you want to create. Be specific about style, colors, and composition.
how.step_2_desc: Select aspect ratio and quality options. Optionally upload a reference image.
how.step_3_desc: Click generate and watch GLM-Image bring your vision to life in seconds.
how.step_4_desc: Download your AI-generated image in high resolution PNG or JPG format.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about GLM-Image
faq.a1: GLM-Image is the latest AI model from Zhipu AI, capable of generating stunning images from text descriptions. GLM-Image provides easy access to this powerful technology.
faq.a2: Yes! Every new user gets 3 free generations. After that, affordable credit packs start from $4.99 for 50 generations.
faq.a3: Most images are generated in 5-15 seconds, depending on complexity and server load. No queue waiting required.
faq.q4: Can I use generated images commercially?
faq.a4: Yes! All images generated with GLM-Image are yours to use commercially. We recommend adding your own unique elements for branding.

seo.comparison_title: GLM-Image vs Midjourney v6: Why Switch?
seo.comparison_intro: When comparing AI image generators, GLM-Image offers unique advantages over popular alternatives like Midjourney v6:
seo.compare_chinese_desc: GLM models are trained with extensive Chinese language data, understanding cultural nuances and traditional concepts that Western models often miss.
seo.compare_speed_desc: Our optimized pipeline delivers results in 5-15 seconds, compared to 30-60 seconds on other platforms.
seo.compare_price_desc: Starting at $0.05 per image with Pro plan, significantly cheaper than Midjourney's $10/mo minimum.
seo.compare_queue_desc: Skip the Discord queue and complex command syntax. Just describe and generate.
seo.video_title: How to Use GLM Image to Video (Coming 2026)
seo.video_intro: The upcoming Image-to-Video feature will transform your static AI images into dynamic video content. Here's what to expect:
seo.video_step_1_desc: Start by creating a high-quality image using GLM-Image text-to-image generation.
seo.video_step_2_desc: Choose from animated, cinematic, or subtle motion presets to define the video style.
seo.video_step_3_desc: Select video length from 3 to 10 seconds. Longer videos require more credits.
seo.video_step_4_desc: Click generate and download your video in MP4 format, ready for social media.
seo.tech_intro: GLM-Image represents the next evolution in multimodal AI, building upon the foundation of GLM models:
seo.tech_feature_1_desc: GLM-Image processes prompts with extended context windows, understanding complex scene descriptions with multiple elements and relationships.
seo.tech_feature_2_desc: Enhanced with Chinese cultural and linguistic training data, GLM excels at interpreting traditional concepts, historical references, and poetic expressions.
seo.tech_feature_3_desc: Model Control Protocol integration enables precise control over generation parameters, style consistency, and iterative refinement.
seo.tech_feature_4_desc: Tight integration between vision and language models ensures that generated images accurately reflect the semantic intent of prompts.
